text:
@RobertKlemko #COVID19 made that possible.
22,200+⚰
550K+😷
All in less than 6 weeks.
Crime is down too.
Most schools in the 50 States, Kindergarten, Elementary, Secondary/High Schools, Community & Tech Colleges, 4 yrs Colleges & Universities, all closed.
Our Skies are cleaner...Cleaner Air!
